text:
Hello! First let me start by saying that I fully empathize with the use case of markdown and / or other content sources for driving blog content.

I’m interested to hear more about the flow envisioned here. 1 time import and conversion to rich text? Post continuing to live and be edited as markdown? etc…
Use the theme variables in Modules
In my tests that was actually possible, unless something's changed.

I think Live and edited as markdown. Basically trying to avoid all the potential variations that arise from using a rich text editor. Even if my content editors aren't familiar with markdown, I would be happy train them and get them up to speed in order to avoid wacky markup
In this world, the post would _never_ be edited via RichText and always exist as raw markdown?
